sentences: Ta oli just saanud oma esimese litapoega kogukonnas.
Oma vanema litapoja jaoks oli see s체ndinud t천eline hullikus.
M천nes kultuuris on litapojad eriti t채htsad pere seiravuses.
context: 'Litapoeg' is a term used to describe someone who becomes part of another's family through marriage, typically referring to the son of one's spouse from a previous relationship. In some contexts, especially when plural or less direct reference is needed, it might be referred more broadly as 'stepchildren'. Informal usage may extend metaphorically.
